rooms.title: The Hyperion Gate
rooms.description: A scary Hyperion robot is blocking the path.

rooms.title: Past The Gate
rooms.description: The gate in the south closed and now you can only go north. What will await you there?

rooms.title: The Courtyard
rooms.description: You're in a huge courtyard. You could probably walk here in circles for a long time.

rooms.title: A Teleporter
rooms.description: This is clearly a teleportation room. However, the teleportation machine seems to be missing a thingy.
